text: *New version* MLJ version 0.16 has just been released: <https://github.com/alan-turing-institute/MLJ.jl/releases/tag/v0.16.0> . This complete’s an extended roll out of new releases throughout the MLJ ecosystem.

elements.text: MLJ version 0.16 has just been released:
. This complete’s an extended roll out of new releases throughout the MLJ ecosystem.

text:
I really like that `@load` now returns a type instead of an instance. Before it was rather confusing that it
a) returned an instance
b) added a constructor to the namespace
